mapper.select:
SELECT f.fdCode, f.fdTitle, f.numberOfShares, c.comName, CASE f.fdStatus WHEN '모집중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode GROUP BY si.investFdCode ) WHEN '결제모집중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode AND si.payCheck = 1 GROUP BY si.investFdCode) WHEN '진행중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode GROUP BY si.investFdCode) END as total, f.posterImg, f.minInvestMoney, f.issuePrice, TO_DAYS(f.closeDate)-TO_DAYS(now()) as days, f.fdStatus FROM funding f LEFT JOIN company c ON f.fdComCode = c.comCode LEFT JOIN businessarea b ON f.fdCode = b.areaFdCode LEFT JOIN dividendplan d ON f.fdCode = d.divFdCode
(f.fdStatus = '모집중' OR f.fdStatus = '결제모집중')
AND
f.fdTitle LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
AND
f.fdType = #{type}
AND
b.areaName = #{area}
AND
d.dividendRate < 10
d.dividendRate >= 10 and d.dividendRate < 15
d.dividendRate >= 15
AND
f.fdstatus = #{status}
GROUP BY f.fdCode ORDER BY f.fdDate DESC
limit #{numberOfRequests},9;
limit #{numberOfRequests},3;

SELECT f.fdCode, f.numberOfShares, f.issuePrice, f.closeDate, f.fdTitle, f.fdType, f.minInvestMoney, (SELECT COUNT(sfl.fdCode)FROM fundinglike sfl WHERE sfl.fdCode= #{fdCode}) as liketotal, CASE f.fdStatus WHEN '모집중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode GROUP BY si.investFdCode ) WHEN '결제모집중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode AND si.payCheck = 1 GROUP BY si.investFdCode) WHEN '진행중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode GROUP BY si.investFdCode) END as investtotal, COUNT(i.investId) as investcount, IFNULL(fd.openstory,'정보없음') as openstory, IFNULL(fd.comValue,'정보없음') as comValue, f.posterImg, IFNULL((SELECT si.payCheck FROM investment si WHERE si.investId = #{id} AND si.investFdCode = f.fdCode),2) idpaycheck, f.fdStatus FROM funding f LEFT JOIN investment i ON f.fdCode = i.investFdCode LEFT JOIN fundingdetail fd ON f.fdCode = fd.fdDetailCode WHERE f.fdCode = #{fdCode};
SELECT fd.fdDetailCode, fd.openstory, fd.comValue FROM fundingdetail fd WHERE fd.fdDetailCode = #{fdCode};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO investment (investFdCode, investId, purchaseShares, investTime) VALUES (#{investFdCode}, #{investId}, #{purchaseShares}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT i.investCode, i.investFdCode, i.investId, i.purchaseShares, i.investTime FROM investment i WHERE i.investId = #{id} AND i.investFdCode = #{fdCode}

SELECT i.investCode, i.investFdCode, i.investId, i.purchaseShares, i.investTime, i.payCheck, f.fdCode, (SELECT SUM(m.mfAmount) FROM moneyflow m WHERE m.mfFdCode = f.fdCode AND m.mfCategory = 1) as moneytotal, f.numberOfShares, f.issuePrice, f.minInvestMoney FROM investment i INNER JOIN funding f ON i.investFdCode = f.fdCode WHERE i.investId = #{id} AND f.fdCode = #{fdCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO moneyflow (mfFdCode, mfInvestCode, mfAmount, mfCategory, mfDate) VALUES (#{mfFdCode}, #{mfInvestCode}, #{mfAmount}, 1, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT f.fdTitle, ff.fdFileName, ff.fdFileExtension, ff.fdFileSize, ff.fdFileUploadName FROM funding f LEFT JOIN fundingfile ff ON f.fdCode = ff.fileFdCode WHERE f.fdCode = #{fdCode}
SELECT fq.qnaCode, fq.qnaFdId, fq.qnaFdCode, fq.qnaFdTitle, fq.qnaFdContent, fq.qnaFdTime FROM fundingqna fq WHERE fq.qnaFdCode = #{fdCode} ORDER BY fq.qnaFdTime DESC;

SELECT fqr.qnaReCode, fqr.reQnaCode, fqr.qnaReId, fqr.qnaReContent, fqr.qnaReTime, fq.qnaFdCode FROM fundingqnareply fqr LEFT JOIN fundingqna fq ON fqr.reQnaCode = fq.qnaCode WHERE reQnaCode = #{qnaCode} ORDER BY qnaReTime DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fundingqna (qnaFdId, qnaFdCode, qnaFdTitle, qnaFdContent, qnaFdTime) VALUES (#{qnaFdId}, #{qnaFdCode}, #{qnaFdTitle}, #{qnaFdContent}, NOW())
INSERT INTO fundingqnareply (reQnaCode, qnaReId, qnaReContent, qnaReTime) VALUES (#{reQnaCode}, #{qnaReId}, #{qnaReContent}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM funding WHERE (fdComCode = ANY (SELECT e.emComCode FROM user u INNER JOIN employee e ON u.userId = e.emUserId WHERE u.userId = #{id})) AND (fdStatus = '진행중')
SELECT * FROM funding f INNER JOIN company c WHERE f.fdCode = #{fdCode} AND f.fdComCode = c.comCode
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO moneyflow (mfFdCode, mfInvestCode, mfAmount, mfCategory, mfDate) VALUES (#{mfFdCode}, #{mfInvestCode}, #{mfAmount}, #{mfCategory}, NOW())
INSERT INTO moneyflow (mfFdCode, mfInvestCode, mfAmount, mfCategory, mfDate) VALUES (#{mfFdCode}, #{mfInvestCode}, #{mfAmount}, #{mfCategory}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT f.fdCode mfFdCode,i.investCode mfInvestCode,(i.purchaseShares*f.issuePrice) mfAmount FROM investment i INNER JOIN funding f ON i.investFdCode = f.fdCode WHERE investFdCode = #{fdCode} AND payCheck = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO moneyflow (mfFdCode, mfInvestCode, mfAmount, mfCategory, mfDate) VALUES (#{mfFdCode}, #{mfInvestCode}, #{mfAmount}, 2, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT fq.qnaCode, fq.qnaFdCode, fq.qnaFdTitle, fq.qnaFdContent, fq.qnaFdTime, c.comName, f.fdTitle, f.fdType FROM fundingqna fq INNER JOIN funding f ON fq.qnaFdCode = f.fdCode INNER JOIN company c ON c.comCode = f.fdComCode WHERE fq.qnaFdId = #{qnaFdId} ORDER BY fq.qnaFdTime DESC

SELECT i.investCode, i.investFdCode, i.investId, i.investTime, i.payCheck, i.purchaseShares, f.fdCode, f.fdType, f.fdStatus, f.numberOfShares, f.fdTitle, f.issuePrice, CASE f.fdStatus WHEN '모집중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode GROUP BY si.investFdCode ) WHEN '결제모집중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode AND si.payCheck = 1 GROUP BY si.investFdCode) WHEN '진행중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode GROUP BY si.investFdCode) END investtotal FROM investment i INNER JOIN funding f ON i.investFdCode = f.fdCode WHERE i.investId = #{id} GROUP BY i.investCode
